content:
UriPartial Enum

Definition

Defines the parts of a URI for the stem.Uri.GetLeftPart* method.

In this Article

public enum UriPartial
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
UriPartial

Remarks

The UriPartial enumeration defines the values that can be passed to the GetLeftPart method.

Fields

Authority

The scheme and authority segments of the URI.
Path

The scheme, authority, and path segments of the URI.
Query

The scheme, authority, path, and query segments of the URI.
Scheme

The scheme segment of the URI.
